publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5252 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to Excellent Williamwood High School—That the Parliament congratulates Williamwood High School in East Renfrewshire on its excellent HM Inspectorate of Education report with five excellent ratings and the young people’s achievements, including very high levels of success in national examinations, the school’s lively welcoming and inclusive atmosphere and the outstanding leadership of the head teacher also being praised in the report.
S3M-5252 Congratulations to Excellent Williamwood High School (lodged on 23 November 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*, Aileen Campbell*, Jim Tolson*, Ken Macintosh*
S3M-5252 Congratulations to Excellent Williamwood High School (lodged on 23 November 2009) Jackson Carlaw*, Gil Paterson*, Des McNulty*, Jack McConnell*

S3M-5252 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to Excellent Williamwood High School—That the Parliament congratulates Williamwood High School in East Renfrewshire on its excellent HM Inspectorate of Education report with five excellent ratings and the young people’s achievements, including very high levels of success in national examinations, the school’s lively welcoming and inclusive atmosphere and the outstanding leadership of the head teacher also being praised in the report. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Aileen Campbell, Jim Tolson, Ken Macintosh, Jackson Carlaw, Gil Paterson, Des McNulty, Jack McConnell
